name: Candy MazeTD
description:
Candy MazeTD is a tower defense game where you defend your king from candies. You must build a maze with towers (Heroes) to prevent candies from running directly to your king. Each tower has different abilities; e.g slowness, stun, multi-shot or placeholder. You can increase turret damage, AOE size, and multi-shot. Don't forget to spend your gold wisely, the candies will be stronger each round.

Game modes:

1) Normal mode every level has 10 waves every wave includes 30 candies.
2)Challenge mode infinite waves and every wave includes 30 candies and you can upload your score in this mode.(You may need to download the to upload your score)

Controls:

Q/W/E/R - Tower shortcuts

F - Sell Tower

U - Upgrade Tower

X - Cancel Build mode

Hold Shift -  You can stay in build mode with same selected tower  

Space - Skip time
